sentences.en: You want to concentrate on the details of your pericope to try to find out what the message is.
sentences.cn: 你们需要注意选段的细节,发掘其中蕴含的信息。

sentences.en: You're going to pay really good attention to all the details of the pericope.

trans.tran_en: a selection from a book, esp a passage from the Bible read at religious services
